name: heart
function: Willpower, self-worth, and material world navigation
location: Right side of chest, sternum to shoulder

defined_mechanics.description: Consistent willpower and fixed sense of self-worth

challenges: Taking on too much to be valued
open_mechanics.conditioning: Pressure to prove worth through achievement and keeping promises

somatic_scan_instructions: Feel right side of chest. Notice sense of worth or emptiness.
regulation_techniques: Don't make promises to prove worth
Only commit what you can actually do

neuroception.safety_signals: Center operating in its correct frequency, no over-identification or conditioning
neuroception.threat_signals: Conditioning patterns active, attempting to be what you're not
